results.title: Metformin Attenuates UVA-Induced Skin Photoaging by Suppressing Mitophagy and the PI3K/AKT/mTOR Pathway
results.text_hl: The treatment of Kunming @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ at a dose of 10 mg/kg/day significantly reduced UVA-induced skin roughness, @<m>DISEASE_Thinness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013851 @@@epidermal thinning@@@, @DISEASE_Collagen_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D003095 @@@collagen@@@ degradation, and skin aging.

citations.NLM: Chen Q, Zhang H, Yang Y, Zhang S, Wang J, Zhang D, Yu H. Metformin Attenuates UVA-Induced Skin Photoaging by Suppressing Mitophagy and the PI3K/AKT/mTOR Pathway Int J Mol Sci. 2022 Jun 23;23(13):. PMID: 35805987
citations.BibTeX: @article{35805987, title={Metformin Attenuates UVA-Induced Skin Photoaging by Suppressing Mitophagy and the PI3K/AKT/mTOR Pathway}, author={Chen Q and Zhang H and Yang Y and Zhang S and Wang J and Zhang D and Yu H}, journal={Int J Mol Sci}, volume={23}, number={13}}

results.title: Therapeutic response to metformin in an underweight patient with polycystic ovarian syndrome.
results.text_hl: Therapeutic response to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in an @<m>DISEASE_Thinness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013851 @@@underweight@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovarian syndrome@@@.

citations.NLM: Al-Ozairi E, Quinton R, Advani A. Therapeutic response to metformin in an underweight patient with polycystic ovarian syndrome. Fertil Steril. 2008 Oct;90(4):1197.e1-4. PMID: 18222436

results.title: Pharmacologic management of the older patient with type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: Older @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ who are frail, anorexic, or @<m>DISEASE_Thinness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013851 @@@underweight@@@ and those with @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@congestive heart failure@@@ (@DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@CHF@@@), @DISEASE_Hepatic_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D048550 @@@renal or hepatic insufficiency@@@, or @DISEASE_Dehydration @DISEASE_MESH:D003681 @@@dehydration@@@ may not be appropriate candidates for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy.

citations.NLM: Neumiller JJ, Setter SM. Pharmacologic management of the older patient with type 2 diabetes mellitus. Am J Geriatr Pharmacother. 2009 Dec;7(6):324-42. PMID: 20129254
citations.BibTeX: @article{20129254, title={Pharmacologic management of the older patient with type 2 diabetes mellitus.}, author={Neumiller JJ and Setter SM}, journal={Am J Geriatr Pharmacother}, volume={7}, number={6}, pages={324-42}}
